document_data.mainbody:
hrimanes was a demon lord titled the Chief of the Cacodaemons who presided over the 452 layer of the Abyss, Ahriman-abad. Ahrimanes was the patron of exiles and wanderers.
At some point during the midâ€“14 century DR, Ahrimanes physical form could be found within an iron fortress in the Abyss. During that time was believed to have been traveling across via the Astral Plane.
